info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:28PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of central Judith Basin, Liberty, Fergus, northeastern Toole, Blaine, Hill, Chouteau and eastern Cascade Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1224 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms moving northeast at 55 mph. Wind gusts have been between 30 mph and 50 mph with this line of thunderstorms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havre, Lewistown, Fort Benton, Chinook, Chester, Big Sandy, Stanford, Harlem, Geraldine, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Grass Range, Parker School, Joplin, Highwood, Azure, Inverness and Geyser. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
